title: Dutch Police Use Hologram To Solve 2009 Amsterdam Sex Worker's Murder
content: The Netherlands Police are using an innovative life-size hologram of a sex worker, killed in Amsterdam in February 2009, to uncover new information about the cold case and bring her killer or killers to justice.
summary: The Netherlands Police are using an innovative life-size hologram of a sex worker, killed in Amsterdam in February 2009, to uncover new information about the cold case and bring her killer or killers to justice.

title: Key Japan Opposition Party's Head Admits To Extra-Marital Affair
